title: surface-to-surface-3d-distance
description:
Compute distance between corresponding vertices.

Computes the vector difference between the vertices of each surface with the same index, as (comp - ref), and output the magnitudes, and optionally the displacement vectors.

surface_comp.title: surface_comp
surface_comp.description: the surface to compare to the reference

surface_ref.title: surface_ref
surface_ref.description: the surface to use as the reference

opt_vectors_vectors_out.description: output the displacement vectors: the output vectors
